questions.questionText: Which class in C# is used for reflection to obtain metadata about types at runtime?
Which keyword is required to work with pointers in C#?
Which feature in C# allows execution of code at a later time on a different thread?
Which class in C# is used to dynamically load and inspect assemblies?
In C#, which type of JIT compilation compiles methods the first time they are called?
Attributes in C# provide metadata about program elements?
Which keyword prevents further overriding of a virtual method in derived classes?
Which synchronization construct ensures that only one thread can access a resource at a time?
Which method in the Task Parallel Library waits for multiple tasks to complete?
Which keyword is used in C# to pass arguments by reference?
Which design pattern is implemented by the 'yield return' keyword in C#?
Can an abstract class in C# implement an interface?
Which method of the 'GC' class forces garbage collection?
Which class in C# provides functionality for dynamic language runtime (DLR)?
Which keyword in C# is used to declare an iterator block?
Which feature allows runtime code generation in C#?
Which access modifier allows a class member to be accessible only within the same assembly and also by derived classes?
Which keyword is used in C# to ensure a resource is released even if an exception occurs?
Which method is used to dynamically invoke a method using reflection in C#?
Which keyword in C# is used to define a block of code where overflow checking is enabled?
Which class in C# is used to represent a weak reference to an object?
Which keyword in C# is used to declare a method that must be implemented in a derived class?
Which interface is implemented by all enumerators in C#?
Can static constructors in C# take parameters?
Which keyword is used to explicitly hide a member inherited from a base class?
Which synchronization primitive in C# can be used across processes?
Which keyword ensures that unsafe code executes without being moved by the garbage collector?
Which method is called automatically before an object is reclaimed by the garbage collector?
Which keyword is used to handle variable number of arguments in C#?
Which interface must be implemented to create a custom comparer in C#?
Which class in C# allows dynamic creation of new types at runtime?
Can multiple catch blocks be used for a single try block in C#?
Which keyword in C# is used to declare a block of code where overflow checking is disabled?
Which interface must be implemented to support object cloning in C#?
Which keyword in C# is used to define a code block that executes regardless of an exception?
Which class is used to serialize and deserialize JSON in modern C#?
Which synchronization primitive allows limiting the number of threads accessing a resource?
Which feature in C# enables lazy initialization of objects?
Which attribute is used to mark a method for unit testing in MSTest?
Which keyword in C# defines a block of code for resource management, automatically calling Dispose()?
Which class in C# is used for high-resolution time measurement?
Which feature in C# provides type safety while working with collections?
Which keyword is used to allow unsafe code in C#?
Which exception is thrown when accessing an array outside its bounds?
Which pattern ensures only one instance of a class exists throughout the application?
Which interface supports asynchronous enumeration in C#?
